NEWSSUB: Latent View Analytics Ltd - 543398 - Update By The Company On The U.S. Executive Order Relating To Fees Increase For H-1B Visa Applications
MORE:
Based on our preliminary assessment and analysis of the U.S. Executive Order related to fee increase for the H-1B visa applications and subsequent Memorandum issued by the USCIS, we wish to inform that we do not expect any significant impact on our operations or financials. 

Further, we would like to highlight that during the Financial Year 26 (till date), the Company had filed 135 new H-1B visa petitions, of which 32 were approved by USCIS. 

We are proactively evaluating opportunities to reduce our dependence on the H-1B visa program through a combination of in-market lateral and campus hiring, nearshoring, and driving more offshoring. 

We will continue to monitor the developments closely and will provide updates as appropriate.
HEADLINE: Based on our preliminary assessment and analysis of the U.S. Executive Order related to fee increase for the H-1B visa applications and subsequent Memorandum issued by the USCIS, we wish ....
